QuestData.Title: A Gift For Gina
QuestData.Description: Have you seen Gina Mudclaw, the market girl? She has it all - looks, brains, and nice big tummy. Could you deliver a gift for me?$b$bI wanted to pick some orchids that grow on top of the big hills to the west, but I can't climb that high. Could you pick a few and bring them to Gina?$b$bOh, and when you see her... tell her I said "hi".
QuestData.PortraitTurnInText: I think she is very nice and pretty. Don't tell her that I said that!
